full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement for Ship Repair Work

**Title - Titre**: F3065-230032 - CCGS Pierre Radisson Refit – Spring 2023

**Reference Number - Numero de référence**: WS3966090287-Doc3966179826

**Publication Date - Date de publication**: April 20, 2023

**Tender Closing Date - Date limite de soumission**: May 5, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT

**Expected Contract Start Date - Date prévue de début du contrat**: May 5, 2023

**Description - Description**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a request for proposals for the acquisition of ship repair work on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (C.C.G.S.) Pierre Radisson during the 2023 Spring refit in Quebec City, Quebec.

**Background - Contexte**: The PWGSC, on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard, is seeking a contractor to provide ship repair services for the Pierre Radisson.

**Scope of Work - Portée du travail**: The scope of work includes ship repair and refit services for the Pierre Radison during the 2023 Spring refit in Quebec City, Quebec.

**Selection Criteria - Critères de sélection**: The selection criteria for this tender are based on the lowest price.

**Amendments**: This solicitation includes one amendment, dated May 4, 2023.

**Procurement Details - Détails de l'approvisionnement**:
* **Trade Agreements - Accords commerciaux**: This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* **Regions of Opportunity - Régions de l'opportunité**: This tender is for Quebec only.
* **Regions of Delivery - Régions de livraison**: The contract will be delivered in Quebec.

**Contact Information - Informations de contact**:
* **Name - Nom**: Simon Presse, PWGSC
* **Email - Courriel**: [simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
